entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:19 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 01:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
